forSchoolStaff.title: forSchoolStaff
forSchoolStaff.heading: myly Admin App for Teachers
forSchoolStaff.paragraph1: myly Admin App for Teachers and School Admin, provides the power of technology in their hands.
forSchoolStaff.paragraph11: Unlike conventional school management software used by a handful of admin staff, myly is used by every teacher in the school, every day.
forSchoolStaff.paragraph2: Completely integrated with myly School ERP, myly Admin App makes life easy for the teacher by eliminating paper based process with the use of technology. Attendance taking for a class of 50 can be done in less than 30 seconds!! Homework and photos can be shared from within the class in real-time.

featureBenefit.heading: Intuitive Layout
featureBenefit.paragraph: Intuitive layout of the app allows teachers to access important features quickly and complete their tasks faster than ever before.

featureBenefit.heading: Message Wall
featureBenefit.paragraph: All messages sent by the teacher, school admin or parents can be seen in one go on the Notification Wall. You can get a glimpse of the entire day's work in under 2 minutes.

featureBenefit.heading: Events Calendar
featureBenefit.paragraph: See all events for the school or a particular class on one screen. This helps you plan your activities, exams and holidays better.

featureBenefit.heading: Magic Button
featureBenefit.paragraph: Magic button brings the most important tasks with just one tap. Options seen by teachers can be controlled by school admin.

featureBenefit.heading: Take attendance
featureBenefit.paragraph: Forget paper registers and manual compilation of attendance. Teachers can take attendance directly from their app. It reduces the time by up to 70% and you get real-time reports automatically.

featureBenefit.heading: Work Offline
featureBenefit.paragraph: Dont' have Internet access? No problem! Keep working and myly admin app will store everything offline. Once you connect to the Internet, everything syncs to the server immediately. Voila!!

1.heading: Message to students
1.paragraph: Send messages to entire school, a class, a group of students or an individual student. Send multiple updates on the same message and attach files for sharing detailed information.

1.heading: Message to staff
1.paragraph: School admin can send a message to the staff members from myly admin app. Staff members can send messages to each other too. No need for a separate communication platform for staff.

1.heading: Coursework
1.paragraph: Teachers can share homework and classwork from the myly admin app itself. Send a photo or type out the text. You can send a variety of files as attachments too!

2.heading: Newsletter
2.paragraph: You work hard in your school. Let the parents know! Share detailed newsletters with PDF files of up to 10 MB and spread the news, achievements and laurels of your school.

2.heading: Create Events
2.paragraph: Create and share events with your students and their parents. Events could be time-bound or spread over multiple days. Event reminders are automatically sent by the system before the event.

2.heading: Photo Album
2.paragraph: Create albums and share images about everything that happens in the school. Social sharing allows teachers to share images on their social network resulting in higher brand visibility for your school.

Admission.title: Admission
Admission.heading: School Admission Management
Admission.paragraph1: myly provides a Systematic computerized admission process with student data & document collection and fees collection along with complete transparency.
Admission.paragraph2: Integrated with the myly school ERP, myly Admission Management is the perfect software for school admission management, and makes private school's admission process very easy. Admission process includes fees payment to ensure no revenue leakage for the school. You can decide to apply any fees as per the yearly fees plan at the time of admission.Parents will get fees payment details and receipts on their app. A 2-step approval system ensures control for the school management.

featureBenefit.heading: Access Control
featureBenefit.paragraph: Only authorized school personnel can access the admission management screens.

featureBenefit.heading: Capture Details
featureBenefit.paragraph: Capture student details including custom fields and documents on admission.

featureBenefit.heading: Apply Fees
featureBenefit.paragraph: Apply all necessary past due and upcoming fees to the student on admission.

featureBenefit.heading: Collect Fees
featureBenefit.paragraph: Collect fees by cheque, cash, PoS machine at the time of admission.

featureBenefit.heading: Approve Admission
featureBenefit.paragraph: Senior managment of school still reserves the right to approve admission.

featureBenefit.heading: Reporting
featureBenefit.paragraph: Get complete details and report on admissions in school within a particular duration.

1.heading: Centralized Admission
1.paragraph: Ensure all admissions in the system from a single point only.

1.heading: Student Data Collection
1.paragraph: Collect all necessary data for each student getting admission.

1.heading: Apply Fees
1.paragraph: Ensure that all necessary fees is applied at the time of admission itself

2.heading: Role-based access
2.paragraph: Only authorized personal get access to admission management

2.heading: Admission Fees Collection
2.paragraph: Collect fees at the time of admission to ensure better cashflow.

2.heading: Reduce Delays
2.paragraph: Reduce delay in admission and fees collection.

3.heading: Error-free
3.paragraph: Admission process becomes error-free as there is minimum manual intervention.

3.heading: Save Time
3.paragraph: By ensuring all admission related items in a workflow, school saves a lot of time.

3.heading: Secure & Safe
3.paragraph: Secure encryption technology and highly secure data centers always keep your data safe

Fees.title: Fees
Fees.heading: School Fees Management Simplified
Fees.paragraph1: myly Fees Management provides an comprehensive solution to schools to automate their fees scheduling, collection & reporting process.
Fees.paragraph2: Integrated with the myly school ERP, myly Fees Management is the perfect software for fees management, and makes private school fees management very easy. Create multiple types of fees, fix penalties and waivers, send automated reminders and ability to collect fees from parents via mobile app, over the web and physically via cheque or cash. Centralized reporting allows reporting across classes, fee heads, payment modes etc.

featureBenefit.heading: Fees Scheduling
featureBenefit.paragraph: Schedule different types of fees (school fees/ transport fees etc.) & choose frequency for collection of fees.

featureBenefit.heading: New Admission
featureBenefit.paragraph: Add a new admission candidate and collect fees at the counter before admission.

featureBenefit.heading: Receipt Generation
featureBenefit.paragraph: Parent/Student gets instant payment acknowledgement and fees receipts in one place.

featureBenefit.heading: Fees Reconciliation
featureBenefit.paragraph: Reconcile fees collected through cheque or mobile app with your bank statement.

featureBenefit.heading: Reports & Analytics
featureBenefit.paragraph: Daily reports keep management updated on fees collected, due and overdue.

featureBenefit.heading: Offline Fees Collection
featureBenefit.paragraph: A utility for accountant to collect fees at the school counter; collect part payment, penalties & allow waivers.

1.heading: Automatic Reminders
1.paragraph: Send fees due alerts to only those parents who have not paid the due fees till then.

1.heading: Partial/Advance Fees
1.paragraph: Collect partial fees payment and even advance payment for fees not due yet.

1.heading: Online Fees Collection
1.paragraph: Highly secure online payment gateway system comes in-built with the fees management solution.

2.heading: Role-based access
2.paragraph: Different accountant profile & finance manager profile for proper management.

2.heading: Real-time Analytics
2.paragraph: Get access to real-time fees due, fees paid and payment mode reports & analytics.

2.heading: Reduce Delays
2.paragraph: Reduce delay in fees collection by providing anytime anywhere fees payment facility.

3.heading: Error-free
3.paragraph: Fees collection becomes error-free as there is minimum manual intervention.

3.heading: Secure & Safe
3.paragraph: Secure encryption technology and highly secure data centers always keep your financial data safe.

workFlow.heading: Automated fees reminder sent to Parents
Parents pay from app or physically
Fees directly deposited in school’s bank account
Parents get printed receipt or email

base-erp.title: base-erp
base-erp.heading: myly Base ERP
base-erp.paragraph1: School ERP foundation with cloud-based data management and secure storage. This allows you to access your data from anywhere at any time. You don’t need to invest in any new hardware or software. All you need is a PC/laptop/smart-phone connected to the Internet and you are ready to go!

featureBenefit.heading: Student Data Management
featureBenefit.paragraph: Collect and manage multiple data fields about each student. Search for student information using any data field, get app login report, promote or migrate students to different classes and generate transfer certificate for each student.

featureBenefit.heading: Teacher Data Management
featureBenefit.paragraph: Store and manage all your teacher and staff data. Classify your staff in over 10 different profiles like Academic Coordinator, Exam Coordinator, Accountant, Event Coordinator, Sports Coordinator etc. giving them access only to specific features.

featureBenefit.heading: Access Management
featureBenefit.paragraph: The Access Management feature allows you to control which teacher or coordinator will have access to which modules. For example, you can only allow Exam coordinators to schedule exams and restrict teachers for the same.

featureBenefit.heading: Student Promotion
featureBenefit.paragraph: Student promotion allows you to promote or transfer students from one class to another. You may promote all students of a class or select a few as needed.

featureBenefit.heading: Holiday Calendar
featureBenefit.paragraph: Plan and create your school's holiday calendar in advance and share with the parents and students on their app. Holidays sync with your attendance management automatically. You can add, edit or delete holidays during the session too.

featureBenefit.heading: Group & Club Management
featureBenefit.paragraph: Students from a class can be put in different groups based on various parameters. Schools also have clubs in which students from different classes participate. With myly, you can send messages, events and images to different groups and clubs.

1.heading: Student Lifecycle Management
1.paragraph: Manage all activities and records of a student for the complete duration that they were a part of your school for. This may include their laurels, activities, results, disciplinary records etc.

1.heading: Email & SMS Integration
1.paragraph: myly features in-built Email & SMS gateway integration to send info to non-app users. Send critical messages via SMS in addition to the app. Turn on/off SMS for many types of information.

1.heading: Dashboard, Reports & Analytics
1.paragraph: myly Base ERP features an automatic reporting service to send key information to School Admin by email. Track app engagement, teacher's communication, fees collection details & more.

2.heading: Secure Data Storage
2.paragraph: myly is hosted on some of the world's most secure servers. That means you don't have to worry about your data security and availability in the unforeseen events of virus attacks, floods, power outages etc.

2.heading: Data Backup
2.paragraph: We still take internal data back-up of your system for that rarest of the rare situations. You can take a copy of you data back-up as often as you want using your School Admin login.

2.heading: Access anywhere, anytime
2.paragraph: Since myly is hosted on the cloud, you can access the system from anywhere in the world, at anytime. All you need is a computer or smart-phone connected to the Internet.

Attendance.title: Attendence
Attendance.heading: Attendance and Leave Management
Attendance.paragraph1: myly Attendance Management provides an complete solution to schools to automate attendance taking, attendance reporting, leave application, leave approval and attendance analytics.
Attendance.paragraph2: Integrated deeply with the school management system, myly Attendance software allows schools to capture attendance in multiple ways - teacher taking attendance on app, taking attendance on web-panel or uploading attendance by excel file. Parents are notified on their app in case the child is marked absent or on-leave in the school. Parents can apply for leave from their app and even submit medical certificate from the app.

featureBenefit.heading: Create Custom Exam Patterns
featureBenefit.paragraph: Your school, your exam pattern. You can define and create your customized exam patterns, and choose exams and subjects to be included. Add columns that calculated weighted average from various tests as per your formula.

featureBenefit.heading: Result Upload
featureBenefit.paragraph: You can enter the marks manually on the screen or via an Excel upload. Select exams and subjects to upload the results for or allow teachers to upload for their subjects and consolidate later.

featureBenefit.heading: Custom Report Card Printing
featureBenefit.paragraph: Decide how your report card should look like. You get to choose the exams and subjects that will appear on the report card. Create your custom grade patterns too!

featureBenefit.heading: Report Card Remarks
featureBenefit.paragraph: Enter remarks for each student about their performance before printing report cards. These are key observations of the teacher for the student for the reporting period.

featureBenefit.heading: Unscheduled Exams
featureBenefit.paragraph: You can upload results of unscheduled tests like class tests and weekly tests that you may not want to include in the report card.

featureBenefit.heading: Result Analytic
featureBenefit.paragraph: Access a variety of reports and analytics based on your results and exams.

1.heading: Exam Notifications
1.paragraph: Parents and Students receive notifications for exams scheduled by the school.

1.heading: Automated Reminders
1.paragraph: Get automated reminders on myly app before the scheduled date of the exam.

1.heading: Role-based access
1.paragraph: Only staff members you authorize will be able to access Exam-result details.

2.heading: Syllabus with exam
2.paragraph: Attach syllabus for each exam with the notification for parents to see on myly app.

2.heading: Result on myly app
2.paragraph: Parents can see result on myly app with average and maximum score analytics.

2.heading: PDF report cards
2.paragraph: You can even create your own PDF results and publish to parents on myly app

3.heading: Error-free
3.paragraph: Attendance process becomes error-free as there is minimum manual intervention.

3.heading: Single/Multiple attendance
3.paragraph: Take attendance once a day or in every lecture as per your needs.

3.heading: Secure & Safe
3.paragraph: Secure encryption technology and highly secure data centers always keep your data safe

Gradebook.title: Gradebook
Gradebook.heading: Exam Result Management
Gradebook.paragraph1: Managing the scheduling of exams in your school, publishing results and printing report cards could be a time-consuming task. Not anymore!
Gradebook.paragraph2: myly Exam-Result management module allows you to schedule your exams in advance and publish them as needed. Automatic reminders are sent by the system automatically before the exam. Results can be uploaded in marks or grades and get automatic analytics about your results. Set your own exam pattern or copy from our standard patterns list. You can print your own report cards any time.

featureBenefit.heading: Access Control
featureBenefit.paragraph: Only authorized school personnel can access the admission management screens.

featureBenefit.heading: Capture Details
featureBenefit.paragraph: Capture student details including custom fields and documents on admission.

featureBenefit.heading: Apply Fees
featureBenefit.paragraph: Apply all necessary past due and upcoming fees to the student on admission.

featureBenefit.heading: Collect Fees
featureBenefit.paragraph: Collect fees by cheque, cash, PoS machine at the time of admission.

featureBenefit.heading: Approve Admission
featureBenefit.paragraph: Senior managment of school still reserves the right to approve admission.

featureBenefit.heading: Reporting
featureBenefit.paragraph: Get complete details and report on admissions in school within a particular duration.

1.heading: Centralized Admission
1.paragraph: Ensure all admissions in the system from a single point only.

1.heading: Student Data Collection
1.paragraph: Collect all necessary data for each student getting admission.

1.heading: Apply Fees
1.paragraph: Ensure that all necessary fees is applied at the time of admission itself.

2.heading: Role-based access
2.paragraph: Only authorized personal get access to admission management.

2.heading: Admission Fees Collection
2.paragraph: Collect fees at the time of admission to ensure better cashflow.

2.heading: Reduce Delays
2.paragraph: Reduce delay in admission and fees collection.

3.heading: Error-free
3.paragraph: Result publishing and analytics becomes error-free as there is minimum manual intervention.

3.heading: Save Time
3.paragraph: Planning and scheduling exams and publishing results is no longer a time consuming job with myly.

3.heading: Secure & Safe
3.paragraph: Secure encryption technology and highly secure data centers always keep your data safe

Timetable.title: Timetable
Timetable.heading: Time-table Management
Timetable.paragraph1: myly Time-table Management provides an easy way to publish your time-table and manage teacher arrangement/substitution for absent teachers.
Timetable.paragraph2: Publishing time-table is one of the biggest challenges in a school. Most education boards are mandating a lighter bag for students which can be attained by ensuring an updated time-table is visible to students and parents. myly Time-Table Publishing helps a school to publish its time-table, notifying parents and students on their app. Daily time-table will be visible to parents and students on the myly app and all changes to the same will be reflected in real-time manner on the app.

featureBenefit.heading: Class-wise Time-table
featureBenefit.paragraph: Create class-wise and section-wise time-table and share with teachers and parents.

featureBenefit.heading: Schedule assembly and breaks
featureBenefit.paragraph: Include assembly and multiple breaks in your daily time-table.

featureBenefit.heading: Different daily plan
featureBenefit.paragraph: You can have different timings, number of periods or breaks on different days of the week.

featureBenefit.heading: Multiple subjects per period
featureBenefit.paragraph: Schedule multiple subjects in the same period for different students in a class.

featureBenefit.heading: Multiple teachers per period
featureBenefit.paragraph: Assign more than one teacher to the same period for a class (E.g. two teachers in practicals)

featureBenefit.heading: As many periods as you want
featureBenefit.paragraph: No limitation on number or periods to be scheduled each day

Transport.heading: Transport Solution
Transport.paragraph1: myly Transport Solution provides a quick and secure way to track the location of all your school vehicles that ferry students to and from the school.
Transport.paragraph2: Each vehicle is fitted with a GPS tracking unit which allows school authorities to see the location of the vehicles from their web-panel access. School can create groups of students for each vehicle. Parents of these students can see the location of their child's vehicle in their myly app in real-time. We also provide RFID based attendance and video camera integration with the GPS device.

featureBenefit.heading: Create groups of students for each vehicle
featureBenefit.paragraph: Tracking and messaging to students of a particular vehicle is automated once such groups are created.

featureBenefit.heading: See all your vehicles on one screen
featureBenefit.paragraph: School can track all their GPS fitted vehicles on a single screen on their web-panel in real-time.

featureBenefit.heading: Connect with RFID
featureBenefit.paragraph: Schools can integrate our RFID service with GPS to enable attendance on the transport vehicle.

1.heading: Boost security
1.paragraph: Student safety is greatly enhanced with real-time tracking

1.heading: Ensure compliance
1.paragraph: Many state governments and education boards have mandated school bus GPS tracking

1.heading: Allow access to Parents
1.paragraph: Parents can access vehicle location of their child on their myly app.

forParents.title: forParents
forParents.heading: myly App for Parents & Students
forParents.paragraph1: World-over, research has proven that higher the involvement of parents in child's activities, better is the learning outcome.
forParents.paragraph2: With myly app, parents now have a one-stop place to look at for all school information. Not only can they get all information in one place, they can make fees payment, apply for leave and even communicate with teachers over the app. myly app provides a secure, child-specific communication and transaction interface, making it the preferred choice of thousands of parents.

featureBenefit.heading: School messages
featureBenefit.paragraph: Never miss another message from your school. Get real-time notifications, messages, attachments and images.

featureBenefit.heading: Coursework
featureBenefit.paragraph: Get real-time attendance notifications about your ward as soon as attendance is published by the school.

featureBenefit.heading: Attendance
featureBenefit.paragraph: Get real-time attendance notifications about your ward as soon as attendance is published by the school.

featureBenefit.heading: Time-table
featureBenefit.paragraph: Real-time updates about daily time-table with timings and teacher names. Bye-by heavy school bags, take only what is needed every-day!

featureBenefit.heading: Exam-Result Updates
featureBenefit.paragraph: Don’t be caught unawares! With myly App you can received exam schedules with automated reminders before the exam date. Get results of your ward, along with class average and highest score for full analysis.

featureBenefit.heading: Fees Payment from App
featureBenefit.paragraph: No need to stand in long queues to deposit school fees. Pay all school fees, straight from the app. Use your credit card, debit card, net-banking or wallet service. All your receipts will be readily available on the app itself.

1.heading: Academics
1.paragraph: Get complete list of all subjects that your ward studies and the names and email IDs of the teachers that teach those subjects

1.heading: Club/House
1.paragraph: Get complete information about activities, teams, clubs etc. that your ward is a part of – messages, events and photos

1.heading: Newsletter
1.paragraph: Get the inside information about your ward’s school. Receive detailed newsletters from the school that you can download and view.

2.heading: Quiz
2.paragraph: Teachers can share quizzes that students can take on the app. Once completed, get your score and the right answers to improve your knowledge

2.heading: Apply for leave
2.paragraph: Have a sick child or traveling out of town? Apply for leave from the app itself. Select dates for leave, reason and even send attachments if needed.

2.heading: Compose message
2.paragraph: Send a message to the teachers who teach your ward. No need to visit the school or wait on phone to speak to the teacher. Connect anytime!

3.heading: Send request
3.paragraph: Send special requests to the school admin. Submit important documents from the app

3.heading: Calendar
3.paragraph: Complete school calendar on your fingertips with details of all past and upcoming events.

3.heading: Image Gallery
3.paragraph: Photos of school activities and students' participation in various events of the school
